templates.title: ionosDnsUpdater
templates.description: Updater for Ionos DNS provider using Livebox 5 to get the external IP

env.name: API_KEY
env.label: Ionos API key to update DNS
env.description: Ionos API key to update DNS, ask a API key on your ionos account

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Ionos Domain to update
env.description: name of the domain/subdomain to update : dns-type. for multiple 'domain:type' should be separated by space ex : DOMAIN='my.domain.net:A test.domain.net:AAAA domain.net:SPF'

env.name: BOX_IP
env.label: IP Adress of the Livebox
env.description: IP Adresse of the Livebox 5

env.name: BOX_USER
env.label: username of the box access
env.description: name of the user to give access to the Livebox

env.name: BOX_PASSWORD
env.label: Password of the box
env.description: password of the Livebox

env.name: LOG_SRV
env.label: Ip address of the Log server
env.description: IP Adress of the log server

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname of the container
env.description: Hostname of the container

env.name: TZ
env.label: Time Zone
env.description: Time zone used for the container

env.name: VERBOSE
env.label: Make the usage of the container verbose
env.description: indicate that you want to run with verbose mode : ex : y if you want to have more detail on the run

templates.title: debitMonitor
templates.description: Monitor the internet speed from Livebox 5

env.name: SQL_SERV
env.label: Address of SQL server to store results
env.description: Address of SQL server to store results

env.name: SQL_PORT
env.label: Port of SQL server to store results
env.description: Port of SQL server to store results

env.name: SQL_USER
env.label: SQL User to access the database
env.description: SQL User name to access the database

env.name: SQL_PASS
env.label: SQL user password to access the database
env.description: SQL user password to access the database

env.name: SQL_BASE
env.label: SQL Database Name
env.description: SQL Database name

env.name: CRON_MINUT_DELAY
env.label: Delay to launch the check job
env.description: Delay in minutes for the CronJob to check the internet debit

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname of the container
env.description: Hostname of the container

env.name: BOX_IP

env.description: IP Adresse of the Livebox 5

env.name: BOX_USER
env.label: username of the box access
env.description: name of the user to give access to the Livebox

env.name: BOX_PASSWORD
env.label: Password of the box
env.description: password of the Livebox

env.name: LOG_SRV
env.label: Ip address of the Log server
env.description: IP Adress of the log server

env.name: TZ
env.label: Time Zone
env.description: Time zone used for the container
